Sugarcss

v1.0.0-alpha.55

s-space

Type:Declaration
Status:stable
Since:0.0.1
Platform:css
@lotsof.sugarcss.css.declaration

This variables allows you to register a space value that you can use in your css easily. through the s-space() function. You can register as many space as you want.

Params

  1. value*Number

    The value to register for your space

Example

:root {

     --s-space-small: 10px;
     --s-space-medium: 20px;
     --s-space-large: 40px;
}

.my-element {
   padding: s-space(small); // 10px
   padding: s-space(medium); // 20px
   padding: s-space(large); // 40px
}

Author
